Top of Page Ted Greene recorded a fascinating solo guitar album in 1977 appropriately called, "Solo Guitar". He...creative streams of his generation." more Top of Page Jesse van Ruller "Jesse van Ruller was the first European musician to win the prestigious Thelonious Monk Competition in Washington in 1995. The jury, consisting of Pat Metheny, John Scofield, Jim Hall, Pat Martino and Mark Whitfield, was of the opinion that van Ruller is one of the most promising talents of his... [cached version]
